tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geothermal_well_construction (
    well_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    well_name VARCHAR(50),
    operator VARCHAR(50),
    depth INT,
    casing_material VARCHAR(50),
    casing_diameter INT,
    completion_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE geothermal_well_construction ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    well_number VARCHAR(255), 
    casing_type VARCHAR(255), 
    casing_diameter FLOAT, 
    drilling_depth FLOAT, 
    completion_report TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE completion_reports ( 
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    well_number VARCHAR(255), 
    completion_date DATE, 
    regulatory_compliance BOOLEAN, 
    notes TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE well_casings (
  well_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  casing_type VARCHAR,
  casing_depth INT
)

CREATE TABLE completion_reports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  well_id UUID,
  report_date DATE,
  completion_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
  compliance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE casings (
    casing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    well_id INT,
    material TEXT,
    diameter FLOAT,
    depth FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE completion_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    well_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    total_depth FLOAT,
    average_temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WellLocations (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 well_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 latitude DECIMAL(10,8) NOT NULL,
 longitude DECIMAL(11,8) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CasingDetails (
 casing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 well_id INT NOT NULL,
 casing_material VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 casing_depth DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CompletionReports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 well_id INT NOT NULL,
 completion_date DATE NOT NULL,
 report_summary TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryCompliance (
 compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 well_id INT NOT NULL,
 compliance_date DATE NOT NULL,
 compliance_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE WellLogs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 well_id INT NOT NULL,
 log_date DATE NOT NULL,
 log_data TEXT
)
